text: 6.2 Mat 15.4 Buk Baybol ak tɨkɨl agak, Nanɨm nap takaw agɨnɨmil tek nɨŋɨd, kɨlop dɨtep gɨnɨmɨn agɨl tɨkak.6.2-3 Kis 20.12, Lo 5.16 Takaw kɨles agak anɨb ak, takaw kɨles okok kuŋay nab okok mɨdeb ak pen, takaw kɨles nokom nɨm takaw ogɨnap sek jɨmñɨl mɨdeb. Takaw ogɨnap sek jɨmñɨl anɨb ak, tɨkɨl anɨgɨl agak, Nad anɨgɨnɨgaban ak kasek ma kumɨl, lum awl tapɨn mɨdɨl, mɨdtep gɨnɨgaban agɨl tɨkak.
